author: Elizabeth Chiu
title: Locking down North Preston so 'our little small community doesn't get wiped out'
description: In Canada's oldest and largest black community, people are taking action to help safeguard their hometown from the ravages of COVID-19.
content:
In and around North Preston, N.S., the province's oldest and largest black community, the signs are popping up: people are on guard against COVID-19.
There are notices on the homes of seniors, families with babies and people with health conditions. "During C… [+4266 chars]
